name: baredSC-1d-logNorm

definition.annotation: Applies baredSC algorithm to fit and combine one-dimensional Gaussian mixture models (from 1 to N components) on log-normalized single-cell gene expression data. Enables identification of subpopulations based on expression of genes of interest and provides statistical assessment of the optimal number of components in heterogeneous cell populations.
definition.name: Single-Cell Mixture Analysis: baredSC 1D Log-Normalized Models

readme:
# Single-Cell Mixture Analysis: baredSC Log-Normalized Models

These workflows allow to run a baredSC analysis from a table with counts in a single click. It uses models from 1 to N Gaussians and combine them. It uses the logNorm scale, 100 bins for 1 dimension and 25 bins on each axis in 2 dimensions.

## Inputs dataset

- Both workflows need a tabular dataset where each row is a cell. The tabular needs to have a header line with column names. There must be at least two columns: 'nCount_RNA' and another one with the counts for the gene(s) of interest. A way to get such table in R from a Seurat object (`seurat.obj`) is:

```r
my.genes <- c("Hoxa13", "Hoxd13")
df <- cbind(seurat.obj[[]], # This will give you all metadata including nCount_RNA
            FetchData(seurat.obj, slot = "counts", vars = my.genes))

write.table(df, "input_for_baredSC.txt", quote = F, sep = "\t", row.names = F)
```

## Inputs values

For the 1D:

- Gene name: The name of the column with the counts of your gene of interest.
- Maximum value in logNorm: The maximum value to explore in PDF. This value should be large enough so the PDF is at 0 at this value.
- Maximum number of Gaussians to study: All models between models with 1 Gaussians to models with this number of Gaussians will be combined.

For the 2D:

- Gene name for x axis: The name of the column with the counts of your gene in x axis.
- Gene name for y axis: The name of the column with the counts of your gene in y axis.
- maximum value in logNorm for x-axis: The maximum value to explore in PDF in the x axis. This value should be large enough so the PDF is at 0 at this value.
- maximum value in logNorm for y-axis: The maximum value to explore in PDF in the y axis. This value should be large enough so the PDF is at 0 at this value.
- Maximum number of Gaussians to study: All models between models with 1 2D-Gaussians to models with this number of 2D-Gaussians will be combined.
- compute p-value: Whether you want to get a p-value. As a consequence, less samples than available will be used for plots as p-value computation requires to have independent samples.

## Processing

- The workflow will generate paramater values from 1 to the maximum number of Gaussians to study.
- baredSC_1d or baredSC_2d is run for each of these number of Gaussians
- All models are combined into a single result.
changelog:
# Changelog

## [0.6] - 2025-03-10

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_text_file_with_recurring_lines/9.3+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_text_file_with_recurring_lines/9.5+galaxy0`

First release.
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1000 520" role="img" aria-label="baredSC 1D Log-Normalized workflow diagram">
  <title>Single-Cell Mixture Analysis: baredSC 1D Log-Normalized Models</title>
  <desc>Fits Gaussian mixture models (1 to N components) on log-normalized single-cell expression data using baredSC, then combines models for optimal subpopulation identification.</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <rect width="1000" height="520" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1000" height="520" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1000" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">baredSC 1D: Log-Normalized Gaussian Mixture Models</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- Expression data -> baredSC 1d -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 115 C 280 115, 350 150, 430 150"/>
  <!-- Expression data -> Combine 1d -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 115 C 300 115, 500 130, 680 130"/>
  <!-- Gene name -> baredSC 1d -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 205 C 280 205, 350 170, 430 170"/>
  <!-- Gene name -> Combine 1d -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 205 C 350 205, 500 150, 680 150"/>
  <!-- Max logNorm -> baredSC 1d -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 295 C 300 295, 370 190, 430 190"/>
  <!-- Max logNorm -> Combine 1d -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 295 C 400 295, 530 170, 680 170"/>
  <!-- baredSC 1d -> Combine 1d -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 630 170 C 650 170, 660 160, 680 160"/>
  <!-- Combine 1d -> Combined Plot -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 880 145 C 900 145, 900 140, 920 140"/>
  <!-- Combine 1d -> Combined PDF -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 880 165 C 900 165, 900 220, 920 220"/>
  <!-- baredSC 1d -> QC Plots -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 630 190 C 660 190, 700 315, 920 315"/>

  <!-- INPUT NODES -->
  <!-- Expression data -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,75)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Expression Data</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Tabular with raw</text>
    <text x="90" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">expression values</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Gene name -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,165)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Gene Name</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Target gene for</text>
    <text x="90" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">distribution fitting</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Max logNorm value -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,255)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Max logNorm Value</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Maximum expression</text>
    <text x="90" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">value to explore</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING NODES -->
  <!-- baredSC 1d (mapped over N gaussians) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(430,110)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">baredSC 1d (1..N Gauss)</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">MCMC fitting for each</text>
    <text x="100" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">number of Gaussian components</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Combine 1d models -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(680,110)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Combine 1D Models</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Combine results across</text>
    <text x="100" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">all N model fits</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT NODES -->
  <!-- Combined Plot -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(920,120)">
    <rect width="60" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="60" height="22" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="60" height="11" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="30" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Plot</text>
    <text x="30" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="7" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Combined</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Combined PDF -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(920,200)">
    <rect width="60" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="60" height="22" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="60" height="11" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="30" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">PDF</text>
    <text x="30" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="7" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Combined</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- QC Plots -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(920,295)">
    <rect width="60" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="60" height="22" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="60" height="11" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="30" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">QC</text>
    <text x="30" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="7" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">MCMC QC</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#10b981" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- LEGEND -->
  <g transform="translate(20,480)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" rx="2" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="14" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Input</text>
    <line x1="65" y1="4" x2="105" y2="4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="112" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="180" y1="4" x2="220" y2="4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="227" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">QC / plot</text>
    <rect x="290" y="0" width="8" height="8" rx="2" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="304" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Output</text>
    <rect x="355" y="0" width="8" height="8" rx="2" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="369" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Report / QC</text>
  </g>
</svg>
